name: Lake Superior Helicopters
about: Lake Superior Helicopters is a premier flight training institution in the Midwest, offering a comprehensive 2-year professional pilot program in partnership with Lake Superior College. With a 10-year history of ensuring 100% job placement for graduates, our program provides unbeatable student support, unmatched industry connections, and a range of certifications including Private License, Commercial License, Instrument Rating, and Certified Flight Instructor ratings. We prioritize safety, using state-of-the-art equipment and aircraft such as the Robinson R44 and Bell 206. Our program includes financing options, scholarships, and GI Bill funding, making it accessible to a wide range of students. By joining Lake Superior Helicopters, you can launch your aviation career with confidence and start building your professional flight hours immediately after graduation.
